p: Thus, this study was designed to explore the resilience of smallholder farmers to climate change-related events in Dinki watershed, central highlands of Ethiopia. Therefore, research questions, including: (i) how is the term resilience conceptualized in Dinki watershed communities? (ii) are there differences in absorptive, adaptive and transformative capacities between agro-ecological zones? And (iii) what are the determinant factors that influence householdsâ€™ resilience to climate change-induced shocks in Dinki watershed? were formulated to address the desired objective.
